name: Play Against Hunger IRL
description:
All earnings above $1 will be donated to help families in need for food. Proof will be posted and emailed to all contributors.  

Game mechanics: you need to make the cheeseball touch the heart. 

- Point and click (tap) to shoot bullets. 

- Bullets destroy coronaviruses. 

- Hot blocks and bombs destroy the cheese. 

- Hot blocks destroy bombs. 

- You can use bullets to move hot blocks, blue beams and sand. 

- Springs make objects bounce fast.
